# ExtendedTouchEvent

[![Build with PlatformIO](https://img.shields.io/badge/build%20with-PlatformIO-orange?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%)](https://platformio.org/)

## Overview
An ARDUINO library to poll touchscreens based on XPD 2046 controller and call functions on certain events.

It is derived from the library [TouchEvent](https://github.com/GerLech/TouchEvent) by Gerald Lechner, 
making some enhancements in performance and usability - no need for negative values and fancy 
switch cases ðŸ˜‰ or manual updates. If you decide to alter the orientation of your panel while running 
your sketch - just a simple call of **setResolution()** once in setup() and after 
calling **setRotation()** the coordinates of the touch will be calculated according to the 
choosen orientation.

The functions are covered mostly by tests performed in CI/CD pipeline and 
locally on a D1_MINI resp. ESP32 DEV or ESP32 S3.

## new in V2
- V2 introduces a new abstraction layer for the hardware depended libraries. That implies the need to migrate
  existing code using V1.x as described below.
- support for [TFT_eSPI library](https://github.com/Bodmer/TFT_eSPI) for accessing TFT and touch panel
  (it's tested with a 2.4" TFT display (with an ILI9341 controller) a 3,5" TFT display (with an ILI9488 controller), other
  devices supported by TFT_eSPI should work, but are untested - so use is on own risk.
- two functions **isInPieSlice** usable for checking whether a point is inside a slice of a piechart

## further documentation

* [API documentation](https://gitlab.com/arduino23/ExtendedTouchEvent/-/blob/master/doc/API-documentation.md)
* [guide to migrate to V2](https://gitlab.com/arduino23/ExtendedTouchEvent/-/blob/master/doc/migrate-from-V1-to-V2.md)
* examples

    - [RotationDemo](https://gitlab.com/arduino23/ExtendedTouchEvent/-/blob/master/examples/RotationDemo/readme.md)
    - [RotationDemoWithTFT_eSPI](https://gitlab.com/arduino23/ExtendedTouchEvent/-/blob/master/examples/RotationDemoWithTFTeSPI/readme.md)
    - [piechart](https://gitlab.com/arduino23/ExtendedTouchEvent/-/blob/master/examples/piechart/readme.md)
